title: Professionals Course
subtitle: Defend Your Organization from Sophisticated Business Attacks
description: An advanced 2-hour course for business professionals covering BEC, CEO fraud, wire transfer fraud, supply chain attacks, deepfakes, and building security-conscious organizations.
target_audience: Business professionals, executives, managers, IT/security teams, HR and finance departments

chapters.title: Wire Transfer and Invoice Fraud
chapters.description: Understand wire fraud mechanisms and payment verification procedures

chapters.description: Recognize supply chain vulnerabilities and vendor security protocols

chapters.description: Understand payroll attacks and implement security controls

chapters.description: Recognize cloud platform threats and implement security controls

chapters.title: Supply Chain and Third-Party Risks
chapters.description: Assess third-party security risks and vendor management

chapters.title: Advanced Persistent Threats (APTs)
chapters.description: Understand APT tactics and implement defenses

chapters.title: Deepfakes and AI-Enhanced Attacks
chapters.description: Recognize AI-powered phishing and verification procedures

chapters.description: Develop comprehensive response plans and security policies

chapters.title: Security Awareness Training Programs

chapters.title: Building a Security-Conscious Organization
